pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========Grid===========Grid contains objects and functions pertaining to 3D volumetric (grid) data.It was specifically written for 3D-RISM distribution data but isby no means limited to such data. Grid requires numpy.Typical usage often looks like this:: #!/usr/bin/env python import grid mygrid = grid.dx2Grid("mydxfilename")Some files can be converted now using gridconvert.py: gridconvert.py mydxfile.dx grdWill yield an Accelrys DS .grd file
